website_summaries.verdict: The New Balance 669 was regarded as a versatile walking shoe that provided adequate comfort for extended periods of wear. It was a highly recommended trail walking shoe because of the comfort it provided during off-road walks.
pros: A vast majority of owners marveled at how comfortable the New Balance 669 was when worn for extended periods of walking
The style of the trainer pleased a significant number of wearers
The availability of a wide option was appreciated by numerous reviewers
The durability of the merchandise was lauded by multiple testers
A lot of trail walking aficionados mentioned that the product was quite supportive
The light and breathable upper was enjoyed by several buyers
cons: Some purchasers ranted that the trainer chafed the back of their feet
The model was heavy and bulky for a handful of critics

customer_reviews.title: Beware if you need 4E!
customer_reviews.text: New Balance!??!?! You usually make good shoes that are true to size, especially width. Not these. They are not 4E. Why can't 4E mean 4E consistently??? I am a NB customer for 30 years, but the last 4 or 5 it is always a guess if the shoe labeled 4E will really fit. Who is in charge of quality control?? 4 E should be 4E wherever the shoe is made. I will be returning these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Don h

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to have as some casual walking shoes and I was surprised how well they support my feet on long days of walking. I was used to having some foot pain after a couple hours of being on my feet but with these shoes I do not have any discomfort at all. My only thing is that I couldn't get the round laces to stay tight after I tied them. I took some sandpaper and roughed them up a bit and not they stay nice and snug.
customer_reviews.author: TennesseeSig

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a European vacation
customer_reviews.text: I needed a walking shoe for three weeks in France and Switzerland. This foot the bill (had to). The size was perfect (NB is great that way with its 4E width choice). They were comfortable and somewhat fashionable without looking like a sneaker (very important in France). They were easy to clean and they matched all my clothes. I could wear them with a very short black socks when wearing my hiking shorts. Or I could wear them to a fancy restaurant. Five stars.
customer_reviews.author: L. Feldmann

customer_reviews.title: Looks good in the picture, BUT. . .
customer_reviews.text: This kind of shoe is what everyone will be forced to wear in the year 3000 when there aren't enough cowhide to handle the volume. Meanwhile, I will never buy this particular shoe again. I'm surprised at New Balance to risk their reputation on it. I was deceived by the picture (but then I must not have zoomed-in) and I was not familiar with this construction type. An additional problem, for me, is the "football-player-type" cleated soles which, with the thing inner soles, makes walking in this shoe like walking on unfinished concrete in my stockings. The only good feature is that this shoe looks good, to others, from a distance.
customer_reviews.author: Billeethekid

customer_reviews.title: Can’t Breathe
customer_reviews.text: Seems like they were made good. The main problem I had was that even though they were mesh, your feet do not breathe at all in theses things and is reason for 2 stars. No other problems
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Order a larger size than your normal shoe.
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are lightweight and very comfortable. The sole resists slipping. However, the listed sizees are very snug. I had to return my normal 9M for a 9.5 4E. The return service was superb: shoes arrived on Monday, were returned on Tuesday and the new pair arrived Thursday. Good shoes, service outstanding but order a size up from your usual.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Tauer

customer_reviews.title: Frayed inner lining after 5 months of use by an office worker
customer_reviews.text: 11/15/2019 update - The cloth along the inner edge is completely frayed. Purchased in July 2019. This is the second pair of New Balance with this problem. We are changing brands.
customer_reviews.author: Florida mom

customer_reviews.title: the fit is great. the only issue my husband has wtih these ...
customer_reviews.text: the fit is great. the only issue my husband has wtih these shoes is the big toe area wears out very very quickly. would be great if the dark tough area extended further in.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha R

customer_reviews.title: A COMFORT TO KNOW!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit very well. With New Balance, if you buy at least one size larger than your usual size, your ok. But if you buy the size intended, your fit tends to be a little tight. At least that's what happens to me. All in all I would recommend the New Balance 669-v1 shoe. I think it`s a great walking shoe. I think even your family doctor would even prescribe them!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes. Always order 4E for my feet. Shoes run a little narrow
customer_reviews.text: I buy these shoes over and over again, as I have wide feet. They seem to run a little narrow, so I would recommend if you have wider feet, order 1 width wider than you normally would for other brands. Other than that, I use these shoes for everything. They are great for hiking, Look nice enough for everyday errands, and for me, work as well.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a quality pair of walking shoes and these fit and feel great! As recommended by other users, I did buy the wide size vs regular so they fit comfortably. Even if you have narrow feet I would recommend the wide.
customer_reviews.author: pontoon4me

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves them and he thinks they are so comfortable and supportive
customer_reviews.text: As far as I am concerned, you can't go wrong with New Balance shoes. My husband loves them and he thinks they are so comfortable and supportive.
customer_reviews.author: DonnaKay

customer_reviews.title: Gift for the hubby
customer_reviews.text: My husband picked them and i bought them as a gift. He is very happy with them so i gave it 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Chowmama

customer_reviews.title: The price the comfort and of course the shipping time. Amazon is always on time.
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves shoes. He saw these and ordered them immediately. They were priced good and he says fit comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Lee

customer_reviews.title: The Fit Overall looks and quality are great
customer_reviews.text: These walking shoes are all you can ask for in a shoe. I was worried about the size but they are perfect. The quality is very good and they look great. The price was very right for a quality shoe. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lenny

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I work in a large warehouse where I am on my feet 10+ hours a day. These shoes keep my feet comfortable. They fit perfectly. I get a lot of compliments from women on these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: comfortable and attractive
customer_reviews.text: I thought the shoe was a bit small (I wear a size 10 and thought I should have ordered a 10.5), but it stretched a bit and is fine now.
customer_reviews.author: Atsenaotie

customer_reviews.title: runs large
customer_reviews.text: ordered the usual size 10.5 for spouse. Were too large and had to return. the shoe itself was very nice looking and one of the few athletic shoes that come in brown.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Tough to put on.
customer_reviews.text: The sneakers were and still are quite difficult to put on. Once they are on they feel comfortable. Trying my best to break them in. Did not expect as much difficulty since I got a 9 and a half and wide.
customer_reviews.author: james j capobianco

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for my husband. He has a very difficult time finding shoes in his size (he wears a 15 wide) and these fit him perfectly and they look great!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley T.

customer_reviews.title: Sensible Footwear
customer_reviews.text: Good all-rounder. Cleats are not very deep so they don’t collect a lot of mud. Presentable for everyday wear.
customer_reviews.author: KJN

customer_reviews.title: I would definitely buy these shoes again
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these shoes to go on a trip to Kenya and they were awesome. I wore them everyday for a month on all types of terrain and for long walks/hikes. They were comfortable, durable, and took great care of my feet.
customer_reviews.author: K Bear

customer_reviews.title: 669s
customer_reviews.text: First wear, not impressed but 2nd wear on, they seemed to conform to my weird feet and now, excellent fit. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Duplissey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This pair of shoes are the best walking shoes I have owned. The uppers are soft and full supportive and the sole and arch support are the best for walking I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Captain Steve

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking shoes
customer_reviews.text: I've wore New Balance shoes for years and they've always looked good and held up. I expect these to do the same.
customer_reviews.author: Keith A. Clay

customer_reviews.title: Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I like the fit on these shoes, I find new balance comfortable
customer_reviews.author: russell debettencourt

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I am retired (semi) and walk to take pictures and needed comfortable shoes the will last. From day one these have been great and seem very sturdy so I hope to enjoy them for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Brian D. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Best walking shoe
customer_reviews.text: I have a flexible flat foot and that makes choosing a shoe challenging. This shoe has the right amount of support and yet has enough cushion to protect your knees. Shoes are great for high mileage walking as well as office use. Great pair of shoes.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Very saisfied
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about ordering on line but I knew what the size of my old walkers was so I bought that size and I am very happy.
customer_reviews.author: mark titus

customer_reviews.title: not as expected
customer_reviews.text: They are narrower than other shoes from New Balance. Had to buy another different pair of shoes
customer_reviews.author: TS

customer_reviews.title: COMFORTABLE
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. I walk 4-5 hours a day and they give me the support and comfort that I need a my bad knee.
customer_reviews.author: MUTT WONDERDUCK

customer_reviews.title: Sound New balance shoe - fits right
customer_reviews.text: Outdoor walking - so far so good but it's early days - let's see how the box holds up and the heel and toe areas as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Koulouras

customer_reviews.title: Great walking shoe
customer_reviews.text: Pleased with purchase. The 669 walking shoe is comfortable and fits well.
customer_reviews.author: Patches

customer_reviews.title: Size Not Accurate
customer_reviews.text: Have purchased this model before without any issues. This time, size was off by a least one full size. Returned product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Same shoe as pictured, fits as expected.
customer_reviews.text: It’s what you’d expect from a shoe. How do you review a shoe anyway?? It covers the feet, provides support, shoe is shoe.
customer_reviews.author: K. S. T.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and have held up to daily walks in woods
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: 4x was a little narrow for me
customer_reviews.text: Nice build quality but 4x was a little narrow, I had to go up a 1/2 size
customer_reviews.author: bill on drums

customer_reviews.title: comfortable
customer_reviews.text: my 2nd pair. I like this style, color. I always buy new balance.
customer_reviews.author: Boomer Sooner

customer_reviews.title: not impressed
customer_reviews.text: tongue is not wide enough and laces not long enough but all my other shoes that size fit good.
customer_reviews.author: Rock'inburd

customer_reviews.title: The left shoe slightly smaller.
customer_reviews.text: The left shoe slightly smaller than the right. These are size 14 but I have some size 13s that have more room. Not happy!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Henry

customer_reviews.title: comfort
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable lightweight. Feet are feeling so much better now.
customer_reviews.author: C L.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and well constructed
customer_reviews.text: New Balance shoes have been my choice for over 20 years due to comfort, appearance and excellent construction. Because of these facts, the pricing seems well justified!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these shoes ! Says they are sooo comfortable. I think they look great on him too .
customer_reviews.author: Mary O.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, and cheap.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for price. The laces could be better since they come apart more often than I'm used to.
customer_reviews.author: Alon

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable fit
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift to my husband. He loved the fit and the look!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.text: Hubby loved them. The fit was good and he's wearing them now.
customer_reviews.author: deborah l.

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe
customer_reviews.text: Make sure to check the sizing before ordering. I ordered the wrong width the first time, but it is super easy to make returns. Once I ordered the right size my son loved them
customer_reviews.author: irishgirl

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe that performs as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Beat the crap out of a pair of these and wanted to get another pair before they quit making them
customer_reviews.author: Patty Antenucci

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of these i've purchased. The second pair has the nicer exterior finish. They fit my feet great, are comfortable right out of the box, without a break in period. I go for long walks in the (3-4 miles) without discomfort, or any blistering.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Wife with  is not wide
customer_reviews.text: Supposed to be wide with but fit like regular fit very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: matthew orth

customer_reviews.title: Ordered extra wide
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 13XW (extra wide) these are regular sized can't even get my foot in them!
customer_reviews.author: R. Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Fit great!!! Really comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Fit great, as specified, made well. Comfortable for wide feet.
customer_reviews.author: Diane C

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and good support for walking.
customer_reviews.text: New Balance doesn’t disappoint when it comes to fit. Great walking shoe, good feel along with good support.
customer_reviews.author: John Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Looks good.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Waiting to see if this helps planters faciitis
customer_reviews.author: Ross D Rosendahl

customer_reviews.title: Great walking shoe
customer_reviews.text: Shoe laces are difficult to keep tied - laces are too slippery. Using a double knot on the shoe laces will resolve the problem.
customer_reviews.author: PA Boy

customer_reviews.title: Product is too narrow.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered extra wide 4E but received just wide which of course is too narrow.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: GREAT, COMFORTABLE SHOE
customer_reviews.text: FIT AND CONSTRUCTION ARE WHAT I EXPECTED AND WHY I COME BACK TO NEW BALANCE
customer_reviews.author: William McAdams

customer_reviews.title: Get different shoe strings
customer_reviews.text: Shoe strings will not stay tied. Have to tie them every hour on the hour.
customer_reviews.author: Daddy's girls

customer_reviews.title: Great walking Shoe
customer_reviews.text: It did not make my feet as warm as the the prior model MW769BR
customer_reviews.author: P. Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Comfort!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was my second pair because I liked them so much!
customer_reviews.author: Glenn F.

customer_reviews.title: how to return?
customer_reviews.text: the shoe is not wide enough even though it has a "Wide" tag attached.
customer_reviews.author: D L Bouque

customer_reviews.title: I ordered these for work for the winter have good traction on them.
customer_reviews.text: Shoe laces do not stay tied. Should have a different type of laces. I use these shoes for work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Too tight in the toes compared to last pair I bought.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
